author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1477897 from branch-1 to branch-1.2 to fix MAPREDUCE-5198. Fix a race condition during TaskTracker re-init which was causing failures since task directories were being cleaned up in multiple threads. Contributed by Arpit Gupta.
